Container.Name: GitLab CE
Container.Overview:
GitLab Community Edition is a software development collaboration tool.[br][br] This software let's you commit and pull changes from a shared repository.[br] First time this docker boots and you hit the login page, you will be asked to reset a passowrd.[br] Reset it, this is the login for the root account.[br][br]
[span style=\'color: #E80000;\']Docker run Example:[br] [/span] docker run --detach \ --hostname gitlab.example.com \ --publish 443:443 --publish 80:80 --publish 22:22 \ --name gitlab \ --restart always \ --volume /srv/gitlab/config:/etc/gitlab \ --volume /srv/gitlab/logs:/var/log/gitlab \ --volume /srv/gitlab/data:/var/opt/gitlab \ gitlab/gitlab-ce:latest[br] [br] docker exec -it gitlab /bin/bash[br][br] docker exec -it gitlab vi /etc/gitlab/gitlab.rb[br] -edit the above to set the [span style=\'color: #E54320;\']external_url[/span] to point to a valid URL.[br] gitlab.rb template:[br] https://gitlab.com/gitlab-org/omnibus-gitlab/blob/master/files/gitlab-config-template/gitlab.rb.template[br] Use the Omnibus Config variable to set custom parameters.
